name: @debate300/gemini-mysql-cli
description: A CLI tool to interact with MySQL databases.
author: debate300

scripts.prepare:
npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const filePath = 'dist/db-cli.js'; let content = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'); if (!content.startsWith('#!')) { content = '#!/usr/bin/env node
' + content; fs.writeFileSync(filePath, content, 'utf8'); }"
